body.name: Canon PG-240 XL / CL-241 XL Amazon Pack
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs 35 mins
features: Compatible Devices: PIXMA MG3620 Black Wireless, PIXMA MG3620 White Wireless, PIXMA MG3620 Red Wireless, PIXMA MG4120, PIXMA MG3120, PIXMA MX372, PIXMA MG2220, PIXMA MX512 Wireless, PIXMA MX452, PIXMA MG3220 Wireless, PIXMA TS5120

Compatible Devices: PIXMA MX432 Wireless, PIXMA MX392, PIXMA MG2220, PIXMA MX472, PIXMA MX459, PIXMA MG2120, PIXMA MX532, PIXMA MX439, PIXMA MG4220, PIXMA MG3120, PIXMA MG3520 Black Wireless, PIXMA MX522, PIXMA MG3520 White Wireless
The PG-240 XL black ink is used for printing documents on plain paper and ensures Sharp black text, and the CL-241 XL color ink is used for printing vibrant photos and images.
Xl capacity ink cartridges can help you save money, print more when you need to and extend the time between replacing ink cartridges.
Combined with Genuine Canon photo paper this ink protects your photos from fading for longer, thanks to the ChromaLife100 system.
Genuine Canon inks provide peak performance that is specifically designed for compatible Canon Printers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Canon PG-240 XL / CL-241 XL Exceptional Quality & Remarkable Durability The PG-240 XL Black ink is used for printing documents on plain paper and ensures sharp black text, and the CL-241 XL Color ink is used for printing vibrant photos and images.XL capacity ink cartridges can help you save money, print more when you need to and extend the time between replacing ink cartridges.Combined with Genuine Canon photo paper this ink protects your photos from fading for longer, thanks to the ChromaLife100 System.Genuine Canon inks provide peak performance that is specifically designed for compatible Canon printers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly, authentic Canon carthridges. Print quality is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My printer ink
reviews.reviewText: I used this product for my all in one machine and it works great nice deep black and white and very nice color print.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the same cartridges I used to purchase at the local stores, but these are more economical and delivered to my door. Fast shipping, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this many times. Good quality ink. Lasts longer than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality ink
reviews.reviewText: Fits canon mg3620! Easy installation, like any canon printer. Prints well. Ink arrived with a good expiration date (sometimes inks are old, so I always check). Thanks Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars delivered at expected time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I always buy
reviews.reviewText: I always buy Brand with electronics. Apparently, I accidently purchased another. Because the packaging was very similar. Did not realize it wasn't Canon until it got here. But decided to give it a try, since I needed it. Color ink cartridge DID NOT fit into my printer. I had to wait, returned and bought Brand. Ill make sure I don't make that mistake again.
